name: Order of Destruction - Kama Saint: Monk / Fighter / WM
author: EasternPromises

posts.author: EasternPromises
posts.content:
This was an experiment to make a very powerful damage dealer in melee. I tried not to sacrifice too much to make it happen, but anytime you have a STR based monk your AC suffers. I'm up for any ideas to compensate.

I can tell you that leveling this guy is quite fun. The trick is knowing when to ween off armor to let your true destruction shine, I would say once you get decent dex gear, robes, and haste. Flurry of blows works just fine with armor though the UBAB does not, but that won't matter until you have a BAB worth writing home about anyway.

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
I understand the blademaster build - all out attack. I sometimes play glass cannons like that.
I can only find one weapon focus in the unarmed build, so i assume that you want to make the fists the weapon of choice for the WM class. Unfortunately that does not work. WF unarmed does not qualify for WM. WMs must choose a melee weapon.
